00008 #ifndef BREIT_WIGNER_H_
00009 #define BREIT_WIGNER_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Declaration and definition of the Breit-Wigner invariant mass generator *
00013  *                                                                         *
00014  *                         g(s)~1/((s-m^2)^2+m^2*w^2)                      *
00015  *                                                                         *
00016  * where m denotes the mass and w the width (fixed) of the resonance.      *
00017  *                                                                         *
00018  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00019 
00020 #include <complex>
00021 #include <sstream>
00022 #include <Camgen/pltstream.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/inv_gen.h>
00024 
00025 namespace Camorra
00026 {
00027     /* Momentum channel class template generating invariant masses according to
00028      * a Breit-Wigner distribution. */
00029 
00030     template<class value_t,class rng_t>class BW_s_generator: public inversion_s_generator< value_t,rng_t,BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> >
00031     {
00032         friend class s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>;
00033         typedef inversion_s_generator< value_t,rng_t,BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> > direct_base_type;
00034         typedef s_generator<value_t,rng_t> base_type;
00035 
00036         public:
00037 
00038             /* Type definitions: */
00039 
00040             typedef value_t value_type;
00041             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00042             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00043 
00044             /* Public data: */
00045             /*--------------*/
00046 
00047             /* Mass and width addresses: */
00048 
00049             const value_type* const m;
00050             const value_type* const w;
00051 
00052             /* Public constuctors: */
00053             /*---------------------*/
00054             
00055             /* Default constructor: */
00056 
00057             BW_s_generator(const value_type* m_,const value_type* w_):m(m_),w(w_)
00058             {
00059                 refresh_params();
00060                 this->refresh_s_min();
00061                 this->refresh_s_max();
00062             }
00063             
00064             /* Constructor with invariant mass pointer argument. */
00065             
00066             BW_s_generator(value_type* s_,const value_type* m_,const value_type* w_):direct_base_type(s_),m(m_),w(w_)
00067             {
00068                 refresh_params();
00069                 this->refresh_s_min();
00070                 this->refresh_s_max();
00071             }
00072 
00073             /* Copy constructor: */
00074 
00075             BW_s_generator(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>& other):direct_base_type(other),m(other.m),w(other.w),mm(other.mm),mw(other.mw),mw2(other.mw2),alpha(other.alpha),xi_plus(other.xi_plus),xi_min(other.xi_min),nu(other.nu),nubar(other.nubar),lognu(other.lognu),logminnu(other.logminnu),lognubar(other.lognubar),logminnubar(other.logminnubar){}
00076 
00077             /* Public modifiers: */
00078             /*-------------------*/
00079 
00080             /* Updates the internal data from the current values of the mass
00081             and width pointers. */
00082 
00083             bool refresh_params()
00084             {
00085                 mm=(m==NULL)?(value_type)0:((*m)*(*m));
00086                 mw=(m==NULL)?(value_type)0:((w==NULL)?(value_type)0:((*m)*(*w)));
00087                 if(mw==(value_type)0)
00088                 {
00089                     LOG(warning)<<"Invalid Breit-Wigner parameters encountered: mass x width = 0"<<ENDLOG(warning);
00090                     return false;
00091                 }
00092                 this->max_cumulant_lim=pi2/mw;
00093                 this->min_cumulant_lim=-this->max_cumulant_lim;
00094                 mw2=mw*mw;
00095                 alpha=std::sqrt(mm*mm+mw2);
00096                 xi_plus=std::sqrt((value_type)2*(alpha+mm));
00097                 xi_min=std::sqrt((value_type)2*(alpha-mm));
00098                 nu=std::sqrt(std::complex<value_type>(mm,-mw));
00099                 nubar=std::sqrt(std::complex<value_type>(mm,mw));
00100                 return (this->refresh_s_min() and this->refresh_s_max());
00101             }
00102             
00103             /* Public const methods: */
00104             /*-----------------------*/
00105 
00106             /* Clone method: */
00107 
00108             BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* clone() const
00109             {
00110                 return new BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>(*this);
00111             }
00112             
00113             /* Returns the mass value. */
00114 
00115             value_type mass() const
00116             {
00117                 return (m==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*m);
00118             }
00119 
00120             /* Returns the mass-squared value. */
00121 
00122             value_type mass2() const
00123             {
00124                 return mm;
00125             }
00126         
00127             /* Returns the width value. */
00128 
00129             value_type width() const
00130             {
00131                 return (w==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*w);
00132             }
00133 
00134             /* Probability density function. */
00135 
00136             value_type pdf(const value_type& s) const
00137             {
00138                 return (value_type)1/((s-mm)*(s-mm)+mw2);
00139             }
00140 
00141             /* Cumulator distribution function. */
00142 
00143             value_type cdf(const value_type& s) const
00144             {
00145                 return std::atan((s-mm)/mw)/mw;
00146             }
00147 
00148             /* Inverse of the cumulator. */
00149 
00150             value_type inverse_cdf(const value_type& rho) const
00151             {
00152                 return (mm+mw*std::tan(mw*rho));
00153             }
00154             
00155             /* Double-dispatch integrator functions. */
00156             
00157             value_type integrate_with(const s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00158             {
00159                 return gen->integrate_with(this,sqrts);
00160             }
00161             value_type integrate_with(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00162             {
00163                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(this,gen,sqrts);
00164             }
00165             value_type integrate_with(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00166             {
00167                 typedef pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> gen_t;
00168                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<gen_t>(this,static_cast<const inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,gen_t>*>(gen),sqrts);
00169             }
00170             value_type integrate_with(const uni_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00171             {
00172                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(this,gen,sqrts);
00173             }
00174             value_type integrate_with(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00175             {
00176                 typedef BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> gen_t;
00177                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<gen_t>(static_cast<const direct_base_type*>(this),gen,sqrts);
00178             }
00179 
00180             /* Serialization: */
00181             /*----------------*/
00182 
00183             /* Overridden printing function: */
00184 
00185             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00186             {
00187                 os<<"BW("<<mass()<<','<<width()<<')';
00188                 return os;
00189             }
00190 
00191             /* Outputs the type of the generator. */
00192 
00193             std::string type() const
00194             {
00195                 return "BW";
00196             }
00197 
00198             /* Outputs the detailed type of the generator. */
00199 
00200             std::string detailed_type() const
00201             {
00202                 std::stringstream ss;
00203                 ss<<"BW("<<mass()<<','<<width()<<')';
00204                 return ss.str();
00205             }
00206 
00207             /* Plotting utility method. */
00208 
00209             function_stream* pdf_plot(const value_type& x) const
00210             {
00211                 value_type n=x/this->norm;
00212                 std::ostringstream sstrm;
00213                 sstrm<<n<<"/((x-"<<mm<<")**2+"<<mw2<<")";
00214                 function_stream* result=new function_stream(sstrm.str());
00215                 result->title="density";
00216                 result->style="lines";
00217                 return result;
00218             }
00219 
00220         private:
00221 
00222             /* Extra internal parameters: */
00223 
00224             value_type mm,mw,mw2,alpha,xi_plus,xi_min;
00225             std::complex<value_type>nu,nubar,lognu,logminnu,lognubar,logminnubar;
00226 
00227             /* One-half pi: */
00228 
00229             static const value_t pi2;
00230     };
00231     template<class value_t,class rng_t>const value_t BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>::pi2(std::acos((value_t)0));
00232 }
00233 
00234 #endif /*BREIT_WIGNER_H_*/
